assumes.post_str: The undersigned is directed to pay that consequent upon the demise of Shri Minister of State (Independent Charge) of the Ministry of Environment Forest and Climate Change on the 18h May 2017 Dr assumed the charge of the office of the Minister of Environment Forest and Climate Change He will continue to hold the charge of the office of the Minister of Science and Technology and Minister of Earth Sciences
